comment: This file contains the default set of roles

roles.name: Root
roles.description: It is the main role. There should be a single root user **Root is given unlimited rights**

roles.name: Admin
roles.description: An administrator is supposed to be able to do anything any author or editor can do on his domain, in addition, an administrator can create new roles and users in his group

roles.name: Author
roles.description: An author can create, read, update and delete his own contents

roles.name: Editor
roles.description: An editor can read, update, publish/un-publish contents created by authors in his group
